title: MICE Hotel Booking Solution - MiceKart Blogs

headings.text: Smart M.I.C.E Hotel search options available for accurate short listing basis:
Complete M.I.C.E Related Information about the Hotel

paragraphs: MICEkart.comis the only online marketplace solution which deals in M.I.C.E products & services. The idea is to create value for BUYERS & SELLERS ofM.I.C.E Products & Servicesby creating a unique platform to help them optimally buy / sell, thus effectively bridging the gap betweenM.I.C.Esolution providers & Clients across the country.

MICEkart.comhas been ideated & developed by Gavin D’Costa and Abhishek Gupta, who are also the Co-founders of Trip Navigator Pvt Ltd, a company providing exceptionalM.I.C.E services for corporatesacross various sectors. The management team has extensive experience of managing large M.I.C.E groups forMeetings, Conferences, Sales Incentive groups & Eventsacross the last 11 years.
MICE companies in Bangalore|MICE companies in Delhi|MICE Companies in Gurgaon|MICE companies in Hyderabad|MICE Companies in Mumbai
